Keywords: Legion of Doom , Scientist , Secret Society of Super-Villains
Real Name: Edgar Cizko
Special Powers
TARGETING: Elevated, Hindering, Characters
LONG-TERM PSYCHOLOGICAL DAMAGE: Mind Control. When Dr. Psycho uses it, after resolutions give each hit character an action token.

Comments
October 17, 2021
Buckwheat
Insanely good for the points. I can't believe that he's not Unique.
April 30, 2021
Organous
Often, when I see a character about Mind Control, I think one thing: is this better than Rat King? TMNT2 Rat King really is my gold standard for a piece about Mind Control. Sure, lots of other figures are better in other ways, but they also often carry other weaknesses. This guy... this is not [b]about[/b] Mind Control, and yet it [b]is.[/b] The named keywords are kind of hard to make good teams, though they've definitely gotten a lot of help lately. it's that Scientist keyword that makes him really shine. He's your standard Sidestep-TK that I always love at just the right value. Once he's done what he needs to do with that, oh look at the triple MC he gets to do! Sure, he only has a 10 attack, but he's targeting 3 things! It even incaps them when he's done, almost like he's reaching back to the very old days (yeah, very old rules made the MC'd characters get tokens afterward). That's a pretty nice risk-reward package. Higher risk for a high reward. The only way to defend yourself is by getting behind a wall, easily stopped. I kind of question that Mastermind ability, too. He gets more attack power as he takes damage, and his STOP click puts him at his best spot! Rat King is probably better at single-target MC and utility, but Psycho still brings an amazing package of things for the cost. I think he's probably going to be on just about every Scientist team I make for a while.
March 18, 2021
Goop
Very good for 45 points. Triple target and all the ignores on targeting make him very dangerous. The stop click is very strong here too. With better def and stealth now rocking 12 attack he is an even bigger pain.
March 10, 2021
Geof-Force
45 points, Wild card, solid attack numbers, Traited MC with a passive Incap effect, 7 range 3 targets, a stop click with ES/D, Super Senses, top loaded TK, Sidestep, and Leadership and Mastermind to keep him alive before resorting to the STOP. And a great generic keyword with Scientist. Dr. Psycho is a must-have and will absolutely double his worth in points whether in Draft or Constructed play.
